title: Max Headroom
description:
From Wikipedia:

The series is set in a futuristic dystopia ruled by an oligarchy of television networks. Even the government functions primarily as a puppet state of the network executives, serving mainly to pass laws Ã¢â‚¬â€ such as banning off switches on televisions Ã¢â‚¬â€ that protect and consolidate the networks power. Television technology has advanced to the point that viewers' physical movements and thoughts can be monitored through their television sets; however, almost all non-television technology has been discontinued or destroyed. The only real check on the power of the networks is Edison Carter, a crusading investigative journalist who regularly exposes the unethical practices of his own employer, and the team of allies both inside and outside the system who assist him in getting his reports to air and protecting him from the forces that wish to silence or kill him.



Complete box set w/special features, with some Channel 4 digital switchover promos, Radio Rental ads and the Art of Noise video. These last bits were random vids I found.

Given our contemporary digital environment and how we take open information for granted, I find it very topical insofar as how much we are observed as we engage in observation ourselves.

Direct DVD to MKV uncompressed rip, 720 x 480 30 fps
